function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"SAMBA firmware warming up period of 10 minutes may lead to delays in accessing sensor data, impacting real-time monitoring and response","Impact":"Delayed access to sensor data may result in inaccurate or outdated measurements, leading to ineffective disease propagation monitoring","Mitigation":"Optimize firmware to reduce warm-up period without compromising sensor stability, or use additional sensors to provide initial measurements during warm-up","Technologies":"Firmware optimization, sensor redundancy","People":"Users relying on real-time sensor data for disease propagation monitoring","Owner":"Firmware developers and manufacturers"},{"Description":"Inadequate error checking and data processing in 'calibration' mode may result in inaccurate or incomplete measurements, impacting the accuracy of disease propagation monitoring","Impact":"Inaccurate or incomplete measurements may lead to incorrect analysis and response to disease propagation, reducing the effectiveness of mitigation efforts","Mitigation":"Implement robust error checking and data processing procedures in 'calibration' mode to ensure accurate measurements","Technologies":"Algorithm development, data processing techniques","People":"Users relying on measurements for disease propagation analysis","Owner":"Firmware developers and manufacturers"},{"Description":"Buffering measurements without sufficient quality assurance may lead to the inclusion of erroneous data in the analysis, impacting the accuracy of disease propagation monitoring","Impact":"Inclusion of erroneous data may lead to incorrect conclusions about disease propagation and ineffective mitigation strategies","Mitigation":"Enhance quality assurance protocols for buffered measurements, such as outlier detection and data validation, before analysis","Technologies":"Quality assurance algorithms, data validation techniques","People":"Users relying on analysis of buffered measurements for disease propagation monitoring","Owner":"Firmware developers and manufacturers"}]}
